row.process: ! &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# :DEFINE &MY_RC#,string :SET &MAX_ITERATIONS#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.TIMER_RETRY,'GET_IP','1') :SET &TEMPORISATION#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.TIMER_RETRY,'GET_IP','2') :REGISTER_VARIABLE "MY_RC#","KO" :BEGIN_EXT_INT POWERSHELL write-host "* * * * * * * * * *" get-executionpolicy write-host "* * * * * * * * * *" $i=1 $max=&MAX_ITERATIONS# $tempo=&TEMPORISATION# $my_host="&GLOBAL_HOSTNAME#" while ($i -le $max){ Write-Host "Boucle $i : Resolve-DnsName $my_host" Resolve-DnsName $my_host $RC=$? if ($RC) { :REGISTER_VARIABLE "MY_RC#","OK" break } else { Start-Sleep -s $tempo $i++ } } write-host "* * * * * * * * * *" :END_EXT_INT POWERSHELL

row.post_process: :IF &MY_RC# = "KO" : PRINT KO: IP NON RESERVEE &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# : PRINT DEBUG &EXIT_KISS_KO# : PSET &EXIT_KISS_KO#="&EXIT_KISS_KO#,IP NON RESERVEE &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME#" : MODIFY_STATE STATUS_TEXT="IP NON RESERVEE &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME#" : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=10 :ELSE : PRINT OK: IP RESERVEE &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# : PSET &EXIT_KISS_OK#="&EXIT_KISS_OK#,IP RESERVEE &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME#" :ENDIF
